articles.name: Welcome to DEF CON 26
articles.text: Once again we find ourselves headed to Las Vegas for DEF CON in the heat of the summer. Hackertracker comes preloaded with most official events, but let us know what we are missing by emailing info@hackertracker.app.

articles.name: 8/8 Updates for DEF CON 26
articles.text: The only official events running on Thursday, August 8 can be found in #hackertracker by filtering Events for Official. TLDR: Defcon 101, SE Village, Diana Initiative and a few other things are going, but check the event type and location for certain.

articles.name: 8/9 Updates for DEF CON 26
articles.text: It's bright and early on Friday morning and we are all anxiously awaiting kickoff of ALL THE THINGS. Find a goon in a red shirt if you have a problem or question and enjoy the conference. As always, hit us up on twitter (@sethlaw/@shortxstack/@_advice_dog) or via email (info@hackertracker.app) if you see issues with the schedule or #hackertracker.

articles.name: 8/11 Updates for DEF CON 26
articles.text: It's Saturday and DEF CON is in full swing. There are always hiccups with schedules and certain events, but we are doing our best to get you the most updated information. Remember to pull down on the Events list periodically to get the most updated scheduling info. Email (info@hackertracker.app) or DM @sethlaw or @_advice_dog on twitter to get scheduling problems solved.
